CIRCULAR  NO 25  /2001 
 
 
Keeping in view the potential threat of Anthrax being used as an instrument of 
terrorists, it has been decided that types of power, including talcum powder shall not be 
allowed in hand baggage of passengers till further order. 
 
The Airport Security staff responsible to conduct pre-embarkation security check 
may be suitably briefed and directed to implement the above direction. 
 
 
(R.C. Tayal) 
Addl  Commissioner  of  Security (CA) 
 
(NO.CAS-7(1)979-DIV-1     Dated   03.12.2001)
